sense.gloss: edible flower bud of the fuki (Petasites japonicus) plant, an early spring delicacy
to become hard and fibrous, to go to seed, to have passed one's prime, to have lost the first bloom of one's youth
rape (seed oil plant, Brassica campestris), Chinese colza, yuntai
